title: Announcement, Fast Forward: A Series of Lectures and Student Projects that Point Towards the Future of Graphic Design in the Computer Era, 1992
title_raw: Fast Forward: A Series of Lectures and Student Projects that Point Towards the Future of Graphic Design in the Computer Era
medium: Offset lithograph on cream wove paper
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, across lower half of sheet, center: DESIGN EDW FELLA/ & ILLUSTRATE
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper third of sheet: LECTURE MONDAY 7:30PM/ ON* DECEMBER 7 1992/ AT THE PACIFIC DESIGN CENTER/ IN*/ LOS ANGELES/ RUDY VANDERLANS:/ DESIGNER/ EDITOR OF; across right edge, running downward, sideways: EMIGRE MAGAZINE; center: CALIFORNIA/ INSTITUTE/ OF THE ARTS/ AND THE AIGA-LA/ PRESENTS:; across lower left quadrant, running upward, sideways: FAST FORWARD: A/ SERIES OF LECTURES AND STU-/ DENT PROJECTS THAT POINT; across lower half of sheet, center: TOWARDS; across lower righ quadrant, running upward, sideways: THE FUTURE OF GRAPHIC DESIGN/ IN THE COMPUTER/ ERA
Verso: Imprinted in black, lower left quadrant, running downward, sideways: CALARTS; across lower left quadrant: SCHOOL OF/ ART; running upward, sideways: PROGRAM/ IN GRAPH-/ ICDESIGN; across lower left quadrant: 24700 MCBEAN/ PKWY VALENCIA/ CA1355; across lower right quadrant: NO PROFIT ORG/ U.S. POSTAGE/ PAID/ VALENCIA, CA/ PERMIT #18

*The word runs downward, sideways.
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black, for lecture series at California Institute of the Arts, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered text throughout.    
Recto: Across sheet, text giving event title, lecturer, date, time, location, sponsors, and additioanl information.    
Verso: Across upper two-thirds of sheet, images of imaginary bugs, resembling vehicles, hovering over abstract scene.  Across lower third of sheet, text givingmailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Fast Forward: A Series of Lectures and Student Projects that Point Towards the Future of Graphic Design in the Computer Era, 1992. Offset lithograph on cream wove paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-11
